display.title: Red Katar
display.description:
Using the power of Red Matter to combine the functions of the Red Matter Shears, Red Matter Axe, Red Matter Sword, and Red Matter Hoe into a single tool. 

The sword function provides the most powerful melee strike of any weapon yet discovered by alchemists. 

The axe function when charged turn a whole tree into stripped logs in one action (right click) and activate again to mine the whole tree (limited for very large trees). It also makes quick work of chopping trees. 

The hoe function will till a large area when fully charged in a single pass (right click). 

The shears will harvest a large number of leaves or wool from many adjacent sheep.
